name: The Scottish Funeral VR
description:
The Scottish Funeral VR was developed with Alpha Rats during Berlin XR Art Game Jam with Google & VR Base. The game works on HTC Vive. (But I originally thought of it for Oculus Rift)

This is a funeral simulator for VR where you are absolutely dead and are capable of playing after-death pranks on the mourners. We wanted to add scoring system for a mini-game inside of it but didn't manage to implement it.

I don't remember when/how it has become a Scottish Funeral.
